name: .WT File Extension
summary: Learn about .WT files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You should not attempt to open WT files manually. Instead, MongoDB references WT files to load the data they store.
If you want to restore WT files downloaded from an Atlas cloud backup, copy them and paste them into the /​data/​db directory. Then, restart the MongoDB server and start the Mongo shell.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
